page.title: 18A boy from Denstone.
page.content: I am Andrew.I live in a new semi- detached house in St.Chad's Close Denstone with my mum,dad,brother who is 19,and sister who is 16.My dad is a butcher in Uttoxeter and my brother is a mechanic at the bus station.My mum visits people's houses and sells household goods at parties. In the holidays I go to the playing fields with my friends to play cricket or football.If it is raining I play with my computer in my bedroom.I like to ride my bicycle and often go to the village of Alton and especially like going to Alton Towers. There is a youth club on Thursday but otherwise there is not much to do in Denstone and very few buses to Uttoxeter.If we wish to go to the cinema, library,or swimming,my mum has to take us by car to Uttoxeter.
